insights.populationGrowth: Growing 1.4% due to cultural tourism and former capital status attracting development.
insights.educationLevel: High 87% literacy due to historical importance and tourism development.

insights.temperature: Warm temperate climate, mild winters (12°C), hot summers (30°C). River valley location.
insights.precipitation: High 1,600mm with monsoon flooding risks along Mo Chhu and Pho Chhu rivers.
insights.seasonality: Pleasant winter (former winter capital), hot pre-monsoon, wet monsoon, ideal autumn.
insights.extremeEvents: River flooding, glacial lake risks upstream, landslides, tourism weather impacts.

recentDisasters.impact: Punakha Dzong flooded, cultural treasures at risk

preparedness.reliefCapacity: High - Tourism infrastructure and cultural importance ensure good resources

economicProfile.businessEnvironment: Major cultural tourism destination, former winter capital, heritage site management
